Dark Background and Light Text
A wonderful extension for Firefox to take care with eyes in general purpose.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/dark-background-light-text/
对于 Firefox user，这个 extension 是目前最佳的护眼工具了，适用性相当高。

http://imgur.com/a/K6l3G

Color Value with my setting：
Default foreground color：#AAAAAA (grey white)
Default background color：#121212 (dark carbon)
Default link color：#E0BC2D (yellow orange)
Default visited link color：#AAAAAA
Default active link color：#3399FF (white blue)
Default selection color：#2D2D2D (light dark carbon)
